name: react-ui-library-starter
author: Luis Miguel Santamaría Pérez
description: Libraría básica para crear componentes con React

scripts.doc: ./node_modules/documentation/bin/documentation.js build src/** -f md -g -o API.md && git add API.md && git commit -m 'docs(app): Actualizar documentación' && git push origin master
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'Actualizar CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && sudo npm publish
scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'Actualizar CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin master --tags && sudo npm publish
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'Actualizar CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && sudo npm publish
